overview: Along the barren canyon lands of the Arizona strip, lies the polygamous community of Colorado City. The Fundamentalist Latter Day Saints, or FLDS, have thrived here for over half a century in perceived peace and harmony. Only recently, as self-proclaimed prophet Warren Jeffs landed on the FBI 10 most wanted list, have reports of rampant emotional, sexual, and physical abuse emerged. This is the story of some of the survivors.
title: Damned to Heaven
